replies.body:
Hey, I fixed it!

https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/455154459765374986/547130239453495322/23e893d1ee096a2e5734e8aebbb8700fdbd96098cb4d759c290cda9258002f79.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oqqEH0Hv,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2019-02-18T19:49:51.495+0000)
>
> Hey, I fixed it!
> 
> https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/455154459765374986/547130239453495322/23e893d1ee096a2e5734e8aebbb8700fdbd96098cb4d759c290cda9258002f79.jpg

I came just to comment this joke, well memed good sir
Nice.
Holy shit, that looks terrible.
I suppose it's your lifelong mission to shitpost on every thread that involves a rework. Nice job, your posts are oozing in brine to the point that each one gets near -10 downvotes.

It's funny you say that because on your Match History, you've played a handful of reworked champions in both Blind Pick, Normal Draft, and Ranked (I'm excluding ARURF and ARAM). I recall you commenting that you refuse to play them because they're reworked and yet I see you play them. Mind explaining?

And before you ask, yes, there's an option where everyone can see each other's Match History.

> [{quoted}](name=Shadowkirby14,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oqqEH0Hv,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-18T19:23:51.978+0000)
>
> It's funny you say that because on your Match History, you've played a handful of reworked champions in both Blind Pick, Normal Draft, and Ranked (I'm excluding ARURF and ARAM). I recall you commenting that you refuse to play them because they're reworked and yet I see you play them. Mind explaining?
> 
> And before you ask, yes, there's an option where everyone can see each other's Match History.

I know about that. I have been playing for a while, you know?

I was extremely pissed off when i played them. You know why? Because it was a result of a lost bet. I doubt you will actually believe me, it's true. If only i could show you my chat history...

Theeeen, why didn't you say that in the first place?

At least people won't shit on you as much, and you have a reason (albeit not a great one tho) to justify your hate

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Dense,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oqqEH0Hv,comment-id=000800000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-19T00:08:19.726+0000)
>
> Theeeen, why didn't you say that in the first place?
> 
> At least people won't shit on you as much, and you have a reason (albeit not a great one tho) to justify your hate

...that's not the only reason i hate reworks. No, i was dragged into that bet BECAUSE i hate them.
these obviously arent the splashes come on guys

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oqqEH0Hv,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-02-18T19:09:52.597+0000)
>
> these obviously arent the splashes come on guys

I believe it is a shared splash (like Xayah Rakan) and when they do "individual splash" it'll obviously be cut down the middle to show the individual champions.
Kayle shouldn't have a body suit armor, Morgana on the other hand is as gorgeous as I expected.

I'm going to miss Morgana's dress.
I know it doesn't really "let" rito have creativity (referencing karthus and twitch VGUs), but it's so iconic.
Her old dress was like a tent though.  In some of her newer skins even it looked pretty bad :/  The way they redesigned it makes it feel more like a real dress.
Nah can't be real splashes ...
A monument to compromise
BUT WHO IS THAT IN THE MIDDLE
Most likely the Aspect of Justice.

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oqqEH0Hv,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-02-18T18:22:42.491+0000)
>
> Most likely the Aspect of Justice.

You mean...JUSTICIA!?! (Name in progress)
More likely JEONG-UI! considering the vibes they give...

>JUSTICIA!?! (Name in progress)

Lel. Best name.
{{champion:86}}

Need higher res to make a judgement.

Almost feels like a fanart honestly but since it is appearing around their tease, it may just be the real thing.

This is extremely underwhelming. The quality of their current splashes is better than this even. Kayle suffers from the Warden Sivirs dumb screaming mouth under helmet syndrome which makes her look silly and Morgana honestly doesn't feel like they same champion either. Morgana has always been portrayed very serious, vicious and tormented in her artwork but the new model and splash both portray her very cutesy. I would never call the old Morgana cute...
It reminds me of how Lara Croft got rebooted and lost everything but the name of her character.
God even kayles splash art is boring and generic.

I don't think this is their splash art.  I think this is just some promotional art, like for the background of a reveal page or something.  The quality and attention to detail is lacking if this is the planned splash art.
Just like every other sexualised champion. Sick of it
who’s the girl in the middle? o-o

> [{quoted}](name=imgrabe,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oqqEH0Hv,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2019-02-18T19:11:14.856+0000)
>
> who’s the girl in the middle? o-o

Already confirmed in the comments, that's Justicia.
i heard. just waiting for riot to clarify who that actually is. justicia was just a joke
Is that... Sona in the background?
Source?
It's on the BR twitter https://twitter.com/LoLegendsBR
The splashes look amazing! Now I'm eager to play the new Kayle.
Slay me mommy Morgana :3 ^W^
The angle...seems like the rework is making her a super tall champion or else why bother giving her only under-boob covering?
I like it
Prepare for the "correctiveness coverage".
